string.text: Basic cartridge pistols Colt M1911, SIG P220, HK USP45, FNP45, Glock 21, and and M1928 submachine guns UMP45. Simple core, the shell bullet.

The so-called "Hydroshock" - cartridge with improved characteristics for pistols Colt M1911, SIG P220, HK USP45, FNP45, Glock 21, and and M1928 submachine guns UMP45. Expansive bullet with good stopping action.

A conventional cartridge 12-gauge, loaded with buckshot 8.5 mm. At close range has great stopping power, however, is ineffective at greater distances and against body armor. Designed for shotguns TOZ-34, TOZ-194, Mossberg 590, SPAS-12, saiga-12, Protecta, Remington 870, MP-153 and MP-133. The most effective at ranges up to 50 meters.

Feathered bullet is stabilized in flight, which positively affects accuracy. For shotguns TOZ-34, TOZ-194, Mossberg 590, SPAS-12, saiga-12, Protecta, Remington 870, MP-153 and MP-133. Increased range and armor-piercing - effective at ranges up to 100 meters.

The shell-less cartridge with a heavy bullet. Typically used for hunting large animals, but also suitable for other purposes. Its heavy bullet doesn't penetrate, and in fact pushes the body armor. Designed for shotguns TOZ-34, TOZ-194, Mossberg 590, SPAS-12, saiga-12, Protecta, Remington 870, MP-153 and MP-133. Effective at ranges up to 100 meters.

Armor-piercing bullets for the machine guns of the Soviet and Russian production of the AK-74, AEK-971, an-94, AK-105 and RPK medium machine Guns (RPK-74). Improved armor-piercing ability of the bullet.
Standard cartridge for assault rifle of the Soviet and Russian-made AK-74, AEK-971, an-94, AK-105 and RPK medium machine Guns (RPK-74). Simple core, the shell bullet.
The armour-piercing bullets for the guns of the NATO countries.
The standard NATO cartridge, known as Belgian index SS190. Used in machines of the NATO countries.
Box with 5 cartridge belts.For machine guns 56x45 NATO countries.
Cheap to manufacture modification sniper cartridge for sniper rifles SVD and svu.
Sniper cartridge for sniper rifles SVD and svu. Has improved features in terms of accuracy, range and armor-piercing.
Cartridge with armour piercing incendiary bullet. For sniper rifles SVD and svu.
Box with cartridge belts 7.62x54 mm machine Gun Kalashnikov.
The base cartridge for pistols and submachine guns caliber 9x18 mm. Simple core, the shell bullet. Weak armor-piercing effect.

Cartridge with improved ballistic characteristics for pistols and submachine guns caliber 9x18 mm. due to the higher initial speed of a bullet is much more efficient than conventional cartridge, and its characteristics are about the level, caliber 9x19 mm. However, you should not use this ammunition in a weapon that was originally designed for the use of this cartridge, as this may cause premature wear. Therefore, this ammunition is recommended to use only in the arms with a reinforced construction: PMM, OTS-35, PP-19 Bizon, PP-9 "Klin".
The base cartridge for pistols and submachine guns caliber 9x19 mm Parabellum. Shell bullet. Weak armor-piercing effect.

The 7N31 cartridge with improved characteristics for pistols and submachine guns caliber 9x19 mm. High speed and bullet design features ensures reliable penetration of armor of the 2nd class of protection. Was originally developed for GSH-18 pistol, and then under the use of this munition was developed by the PP-2000. Note that due to the increased power of this ammunition is not recommended to use it in a weapon that was originally designed for the use of this cartridge, as this may cause premature wear.
Armor-piercing bullets for rifles OC-14 "Groza", "Whirlwind", 9ю91, as well as the as-Val, VSS and VSK-94. Has subsonic flight, but due to the bullets of a special design punches most body armor.

The cartridge of the assault rifle OTS-14 "Groza", "Vortex", 9ю91, as well as the as-Val, VSS and VSK-94. Later and cheap modification to manufacture armor-piercing bullets. Has subsonic flight, but due to the bullets of a special design punches most body armor.
Sniper cartridge for assault rifle OTS-14 "Groza", "Vortex", 9ю91, as well as the as-Val, VSS and VSK-94. Has subsonic flight, but due to the heavy bullet of special design punches most body armor.
Energy capacity with ready killer elements in store for plazmometov. The energy source is an encapsulated piece of artifact "Flash".
Grenade for the grenade launcher M203, M79 and an integrated grenade launcher to the F2000.
High-explosive grenade for RPG-7V. Equally effective against manpower, and against legkopodwijnaya technology.
The standard grenade for grenade launcher GP-25 "Bonfire", from a grenade launcher OTS-14 "Groza" and RG-6.
Grenade for grenade launcher GP-25 "Bonfire", from a grenade launcher OTS-14 "Groza" and RG-6. Before the explosion the grenade bounces to a height of about a meter, which increases its lethality.
Defensive hand grenade with a large blast radius with shrapnel. Throw is only recommended from the shelter.
Manual smoke grenade. Designed for installation of the flue cover. Duration - 10 seconds.
Offensive hand grenade with a small radius of splinter.
